project.description: Start another Jenkins instance using docker, within the current instance.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: JENKINS_PORT=$((JENKINS_PORT+1)) echo $JENKINS_PORT echo "Starting new Jenkins server at http://localhost:$JENKINS_PORT" docker run -p $JENKINS_PORT:8080 -e JENKINS_PORT=$JENKINS_PORT --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock --name jenkins-$JENKINS_PORT jenkins-in-jenkins
